show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Truth And Health
content:
· Can Telling the Truth Affect our Health? · Does Modest Short Term Weight Loss Have Long Term Health Benefits? <!--more--> · What Can you Feed Your Children to Increase their IQ?
· The Effect of Antipsychotic Drugs on Children · Can the Smell of a Fragrant Essential Oil Prevent Falls and Anxiety?
Vicki’s 20:20 Health Tips……Laughter is the Best Medicine · The Yaya Sisters · The Generous Husband Callers: · Cassandra: trauma therapy · Greg: school teacher saying that many kids are in the “twilight zone” abused with ADD/ADHD drugs, food in schools, etc.
and that parents need to take ownership.
